title: The Ash House
subtitle: Time-Shifting Horror Demo

media.alt: The Ash House - Haunted Manor Poster
The Ash House Official Gameplay Teaser

description:
Experience a chilling demo of The Ash House - a first-person psychological horror where time itself is broken. Play as Jude, an investigative journalist trapped in a manor that exists across three timelines. Solve inter-connected puzzles while evading the Ash Mother, an adaptive AI entity that learns from your every move.

This demo includes:
- 30 minutes of gameplay across two timelines
- Introduction to time-shifting mechanics
- Two key puzzles showcasing the game's unique chronology system
- A terrifying encounter with the Ash Mother
shortDescription: Demo: A time-shifting horror where the house remembers and hunts.
shortDescriptionUnderGallery: Try the demo of our upcoming psychological horror game featuring innovative time-manipulation gameplay.
keyFeatures: Environmental storytelling with Indian horror influences
developerNotes: From Snowman Studio: This demo showcases our innovative time-manipulation horror gameplay. The full game will include three timelines and multiple endings.
system_requirements_content:
DEMO REQUIREMENTS:
Minimum:
OS: Windows 10 (64-bit)
Processor: Intel Core i5-4460 / AMD FX-8350
Memory: 8 GB RAM
Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 960 / AMD Radeon R9 280
Storage: 5 GB available space

Recommended:
OS: Windows 10/11 (64-bit)
Processor: Intel Core i7-6700 / AMD Ryzen 5 2600
Memory: 16 GB RAM
Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1060 / AMD RX 580
Storage: 5 GB SSD space
key_features_tab_content:
Key features of The Ash House demo include:
- **Time-Shifting Gameplay:** Navigate between past and present timelines to solve puzzles and uncover secrets. What you do in one timeline directly impacts the other.
- **Adaptive AI Antagonist:** The Ash Mother learns from your playstyle. She'll adapt her patrol routes, hiding spots, and attack patterns based on your actions, ensuring no two playthroughs are identical.
- **Chronology Puzzles:** Solve intricate puzzles that span across timelines, requiring you to manipulate objects and events in the past to alter the present.
- **Atmospheric Horror:** Immerse yourself in a dense, oppressive atmosphere inspired by classic survival horror and infused with unique Indian folklore elements.
- **Environmental Storytelling:** Piece together the tragic history of the Ash family and the manor through notes, visions, and environmental clues.

title: Whispers of the Forgotten
subtitle: A Narrative Mystery

media.alt: Whispers of the Forgotten - Main Cover Art
Clue board in Whispers of the Forgotten
Whispers of the Forgotten Gameplay Trailer

description: Unravel a decades-old mystery in Whispers of the Forgotten. As a private investigator, you're tasked with solving a cold case that everyone else gave up on. Explore a remote village, interview its secretive inhabitants, and piece together clues from the past and present. Your choices will shape the investigation and determine the fate of those involved.
shortDescription: Solve a chilling cold case in this narrative-driven mystery game.
shortDescriptionUnderGallery: Explore a mysterious village and uncover its dark secrets.
heroTagline: Some secrets refuse to stay buried.
keyFeatures: Deep, branching narrative with multiple endings
Player choices that significantly impact the story
Detailed investigation mechanics: examine clues, interview suspects
developerNotes: This is our studio's take on a classic detective story, with a focus on character development and player agency.
system_requirements_content:
Minimum:
OS: Windows 10 / macOS Catalina
Processor: Intel Core i3 or equivalent
Memory: 8 GB RAM
Graphics: Integrated Graphics (Intel Iris Plus or similar)
Storage: 10 GB available space

Recommended:
OS: Windows 11 / macOS Monterey
Processor: Intel Core i5 or equivalent
Memory: 12 GB RAM
Graphics: Dedicated GPU with 2GB VRAM
Storage: 10 GB SSD space
key_features_tab_content:
- **Branching Narrative:** Your decisions lead to one of several unique endings.
- **Character-Driven Story:** Get to know a cast of memorable characters, each with their own secrets.
- **Investigation Tools:** Use your journal, map, and inventory to track clues and solve puzzles.
- **Atmospheric World:** Explore a beautifully crafted village with a haunting soundtrack.
